Articles.Content: Which planets, dwarf planets, and moons should get their own Analogues?

45 minutes ago, PlutoISaPlanet said:

Which planets, dwarf planets, and moons should get their own Analogues?

Seeing as the developers have already announced no changes to the stock Kerbolar system beyond graphical adjustments, it wouldn't make sense for any additional real-life analogues to show up in KSP 2. The only possibility I can see is perhaps loose interpretations of real-world star systems, perhaps the TRAPPIST-1 or Alpha Centauri systems.

Depends on if "Kerbol system hasn't been changed" means "KSP 1 objects are untouched" or "Kerbol system is identical to KSP 1's".
